original_text:
“We will give it back,” they said. “And we will not demand anything more from them. We will do as you say.”
Then I summoned the priests and made the nobles and officials take an oath to do what they had promised.
korean_text: 그들이 말하기를 우리가 당신의 말씀대로 행하여 돌려보내고 그들에게서 아무것도 요구하지 아니하리이다 하기로 내가 제사장들을 불러 그들에게 그 말대로 행하겠다고 맹세하게 하고

sentences.original_text: And we will not demand anything more from them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 그들에게 더 이상 아무것도 요구하지 않겠습니다.

sentences.original_text: We will do as you say.
and made the nobles and officials take an oath
to do what they had promised.
